link.title: Holland Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

div.p: Extended eLearning days include the following dates: April 7th-April 9th, April 14th-April 16th, April 21st-April 23rd, April 28th-April 30th, May 5th-May 7th, and May 12th-May 14th. Mondays and Fridays during these weeks will be teacher preparation days and will be non-academic for students.

span.p: Extended eLearning days include the following dates: April 7th-April 9th, April 14th-April 16th, April 21st-April 23rd, April 28th-April 30th, May 5th-May 7th, and May 12th-May 14th. Mondays and Fridays during these weeks will be teacher preparation days and will be non-academic for students.

h1.span: Counselortalk Tips for Parents & Students during School Closures

span.strong: We are here to support YOU and your families. Here are a few resources from our district's social workers, April Susnjara and Christine Vinson.

p.font: Child Mind — This article offers ways to give support to kids and to structure time at home during this period -

a.font: Talking to Children About COVID-19: A Parent Resource
Parent/Caregiver Guide to Helping Families Cope with the Coronavirus Disease 2019

font.strong: Center for the Study of Traumatic Stress Fact Sheet:

font.a: Taking Care of Your Family During Coronavirus and Other Emerging Infectious Disease Outbreaks
